import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:5000/api',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const fetchProducts=()=>api.get('/products');export const fetchCategories=()=>api.get('/categories');export const fetchUsers=()=>api.get('/users');export const fetchOrders=()=>api.get('/orders');export const createProduct=productData=>api.post('/products',productData);export const updateProduct=(id,productData)=>api.put("/products/".concat(id),productData);export const deleteProduct=id=>api.delete("/products/".concat(id));export const getProductsByCategory=categoryId=>api.get("/products/category/".concat(categoryId));// Category operations
export const createCategory=categoryData=>api.post('/categories',categoryData);export const updateCategory=(id,categoryData)=>api.put("/categories/".concat(id),categoryData);export const deleteCategory=id=>api.delete("/categories/".concat(id));export default api;
